story.name: AddApplications.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Adding a new contact Given Main page is opened When User clicks create new contact button And User fill fields with title <title> email <email> and phone number <phone> And Submit create form Then New contact <title> created and displayed on main page
Scenario:Deleting contact Given Main page is opened When Click delete buttn for contact <contact> Then New contact <contact> deleted and not displayed on main page
